name: HOPE VR: Emotional Intelligence Assistant
description:
H.O.P.E is designed to be a calming experience in Virtual Reality that allows you to disconnect from the stress of the real world, and reconnect with your self in one of the many spectacular environments available, all while HOPE guides you through carefully designed Breathing and meditation exercises to help you start your day.




  • Voice Activated communication
Fully voice activated so you won't need any controllers or fancy devices, just your VR headset.

  • Many natural locations to travel to
H.O.P.E has the ability to take you to many natural locations, where we hope that you'll find your happy place.

  • Guided Breathing and meditation exercises
If you wish, you can ask H.O.P.E to start a breathing exercise in your choice of natural location to help you reconnect with your self.

  • Day/Night Cycles
H.O.P.E has the ability to distinguish your real life time and Date. and apply those changes to the environment that you'll travel to.



Please note that H.O.P.E is meant to be an experience that you use on a daily basis rather than a game that you "Finish", the only goal of H.O.P.E is to help you manage your stress and anxiety, all while giving you the occasional attitude depending on her mode!
